pages.text: To make the $(thing)Wither$() a tad less daunting, $(thing)Bliss$() provides you with a new weapon: $(thing)Snow Golems$().$(br2)That's right. $(thing)Snow Golems$() are now super effective against the $(thing)Wither$(). A stack sized pile of them will make short work of the monster! Note that it'll still destroy the terrain, so be careful where you spawn it!

Additionally, the $(thing)Wither$() fight is changed based on your game's difficulty setting:$(br)$(li)In $(thing)Easy$(), it will not spawn at all, and instead you'll just get an $(item)Nether Star$() for making the structure.$(li)In $(thing)Hard$(), the boss will regain its immunity to snow, so you'll have to fight it proper.
